mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SPC_NO , SPC_NAME , MAP_LOCATION , SPC_CHIMG , SPC_TAG , SPC_PRICE , COUNT(REVIEW_NO) REVIEWS FROM SPACE_INFO full OUTER JOIN REVIEW USING (SPC_NO) WHERE SPC_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY SPC_NO, SPC_NAME, MAP_LOCATION, SPC_TAG, SPC_PRICE, SPC_CHIMG ) JOIN ( SELECT SPC_NO, COUNT (*) WISHES FROM WISH GROUP BY SPC_NO ) USING (SPC_NO) ORDER BY reviews desc, wishes desc ) where rownum < 4

select * from ( SELECT SPC_NO , SPC_NAME , MAP_LOCATION , SPC_CHIMG , SPC_TAG , SPC_PRICE FROM SPACE_INFO ) FULL outer join ( SELECT SUBSTR(REVIEW_CONTENT, 0, 31)AS REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_SCORE , REVIEW_DATE , SPC_NO FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_SCORE > 3 ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC, REVIEW_SCORE DESC ) using (spc_no) WHERE ROWNUM < 10
select user_nickname , USER_PROFILE_C , PROFILE_PATH from member where user_status = 'Y' and user_id = #{userId}

select * from ( select spc_no , spc_name , spc_tag , spc_type , spc_chimg , spc_price , COUNT(REVIEW_NO) REVIEWS from space_info full outer join review using(spc_no) where user_id = #{userId} and spc_status = 'Y' group by spc_name, spc_tag, spc_type, spc_chimg, spc_price, spc_no ) join ( select * from ( select spc_no from space_info where user_id = #{userId} ) left outer join ( select spc_no, count(spc_no) as wishes from wish group by spc_no ) using (spc_no) ) using(spc_no)

select count(*) from ( select * from ( select review_writer , USER_NICKNAME , USER_PROFILE_C , PROFILE_PATH , spc_no , review_content , review_score , review_date , review_reply from review join member on (review_writer = user_id) where review_status = 'Y' ) right join ( select spc_no from space_info where user_id = #{userId} ) using (spc_no) order by review_date desc )

select * from ( select review_no , review_writer , USER_NICKNAME , USER_PROFILE_C , PROFILE_PATH , spc_no , review_content , review_score , review_date , review_reply from review join member on (review_writer = user_id) where review_status = 'Y' ) right join ( select spc_no from space_info where user_id = #{userId} ) using (spc_no) order by review_date desc
select * from space_info where spc_no = #{spcNo} and spc_status = 'Y'
select spc_no , img_no , img_ogimg , img_chimg from spc_images join space_info using(spc_no) where spc_no = #{spcNo} and spc_status = 'Y'
select distinct user_nickname , user_profile_c , profile_path from member join space_info using (user_id) where user_id = (select user_id from space_info where spc_no = #{spcNo})
select count(*) as listCount from review where spc_no = #{spcNo} and review_status = 'Y'

select review_no , spc_no , review_writer , review_title , review_content , review_score , review_date , review_reply , user_nickname , user_profile_c , profile_path from review join member on (review_writer = user_id) where spc_no = #{spcNo} and review_status = 'Y' order by review_no desc
select count(*) as qnas from question_answer where spc_no = #{spcNo} and qa_status = 'Y' and qa_secret = 'Y'
select * from question_answer where spc_no = #{spcNo} and qa_status = 'Y' and qa_secret = 'Y' order by qa_no desc
